General.Name: Sunrise Consulting
General.Description: Sunrise Consulting Group, Inc. operates in the solar industry in the United States. The company, through its subsidiary, United Power Solar, Inc., engages in the development, manufacture, marketing, and sale of solar-powered chargers for mobile devices. Sunrise Consulting Group, Inc. offers a range of products, including mobile phone, laptop, PDA, and PSP player cases with various connectors. Its products are used in consumer portable device markets, such as cell phones, Blackberrys, iPods, iPads, and Kindles. The company was formerly known as Sun Quest Holdings, Inc. and changed its name to Sunrise Consulting Group, Inc. in October 2007. Sunrise Consulting Group, Inc. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Newport Beach, California.
General.Address: 2901 West Coast Highway, Newport Beach, CA, United States, 92663
